page.title: 01OVERVIEW
page.content: The area we are surveying is 12 square kilometres. It consists of 2 main areas of housing, Foxbar and Glenburn. There is very little industry, with the exception of Grants in Glenburn and the carpet works at Elderslie. The rest of our area is mainly open spaces, used for various activities, including farming,recreation and open moorland. There are a number of parks, Brodie Park, The Glen Park(a country park), Robertson Park and 2 golf courses, Paisley Golf Club and Elderslie Golf Club.The southern end of our area is much higher than the rest. This area of upland is called Gleniffer Braes. The other outstanding feature is the Stanely Reservoir, almost in the middle of the area.
